edu.rice.starvote

Class PrinterMotor

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rice.starvote.PrinterMotor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMotor

    public class PrinterMotor
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMotor

    Reference implementation of the feed motor controller, driving the main motor in an HP 1010 printer.

    • Constructor Summary

      • PrinterMotor

        public PrinterMotor(int forwardPin,
                    int reversePin,
                    IPWMDriver driver)

        Constructor.

        Parameters:
        forwardPin - Pin that moves motor forward when HIGH (BCM numbering).
        reversePin - Pin that moves motor reverse when HIGH (BCM numbering).
        driver - PWM driver module.

        driver - PWM driver module.

      • forwardSlow

        public void forwardSlow()
        Description copied from interface: IMotor

        Move motor forward at slow speed. The exact speed is undefined but should be less than half full. For precise speed control, use the method forward(double speed).

        Specified by:
        forwardSlow in interface IMotor

        public void reverseSlow()

        Specified by:
